title: Screenshots getting overwritten
body:
Basically I've run into a small problem where i can only screenshot once a game, anymore then that and my screenshot gets replaced.

For example if I screenshot with F12. Screenshot1000 is made, if I do it again in a few minutes, another screenshot is taken, replacing the previous one while being called Screenshot1000.

Any possible fixes would be appreciated, cheers.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
